name: Space Dream Demo
detailed_description:
Nine Months in the making, the highly anticipated Demo of Space Dream VR arrives on PC.
Space Dream VR immerses you in a stunning work of art, a celestial world that pulses with life.
Abandoning traditional gameplay for a purely aesthetic experience, the Space Dream VR Demo interfaces with music from any source; pulsating to the frequencies of sound.
Rather than defining itself as a ‘game’ or a ‘music visualizer’, Space Dream VR combines elements from both worlds to produce an entirely new genre of interactive entertainment.

Features:

  • Automatically detect the music you play from any source on your PC!
  • Choose the visual intensity of the music visualization effects using the "Trippiness Slider" in the menu.
  • Teleportation mode for those who suffer from motion sickness
  • Free Fly mode for those who want the full experience
  • Galaxy Tour: get taken on a ride through the cosmos without the needing to control your movements.
  • Trillions of blades of grass, a six-hundred-thousand particle galaxy, and ultra detailed textures on every surface.
  • Real Time Graphics Benchmarking.
  • Keyboard, Gamepad & HTC Vive Support
  • Oculus Rift support coming soon!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or equivalent
  • Storage: 2650 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.67 GHz | AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 or 1060 | | AMD Radeon 290X or equivalent.
  • Storage: 2650 MB available space
